queries.description: A project shall not contain instances of non-volatile variables being given values that are not subsequently used.
queries.name: Non-volatile variable assigned a value which is never used

A0-1-1.title: A project shall not contain instances of non-volatile variables being given values that are not subsequently used.

queries.description: The value returned by a function having a non-void return type that is not an overloaded operator shall be used.
queries.name: Unused return value

A0-1-2.title: The value returned by a function having a non-void return type that is not an overloaded operator shall be used.

queries.description: Every function defined in an anonymous namespace, or static function with internal linkage, or private member function shall be used.
queries.name: Unused local function

A0-1-3.title: Every function defined in an anonymous namespace, or static function with internal linkage, or private member function shall be used.

queries.description: Unused parameters can indicate a mistake when implementing the function.
queries.name: There shall be no unused named parameters in non-virtual functions

A0-1-4.title: There shall be no unused named parameters in non-virtual functions.

queries.description: There shall be no unused named parameters in the set of parameters for a virtual function and all the functions that override it.
queries.name: There shall be no unused named parameters in virtual functions

A0-1-5.title: There shall be no unused named parameters in the set of parameters for a virtual function and all the functions that override it.

queries.description: Unused type declarations are either redundant or indicate a possible mistake on the part of the programmer.
queries.name: There should be no unused type declarations

A0-1-6.title: There should be no unused type declarations.

queries.description: Unreachable code complicates the program and can indicate a possible mistake on the part of the programmer.
queries.name: A project shall not contain unreachable code

M0-1-1.title: A project shall not contain unreachable code.

queries.description: Uncalled functions complicate the program and can indicate a possible mistake on the part of the programmer.
queries.name: Every defined function should be called at least once

M0-1-10.title: Every defined function should be called at least once.

queries.description: Infeasible paths complicate the program and can indicate a possible mistake on the part of the programmer.
queries.name: A project shall not contain infeasible paths

M0-1-2.title: A project shall not contain infeasible paths.

queries.description: Unused variables complicate the program and can indicate a possible mistake on the part of the programmer.
queries.name: A project shall not contain unused local variables

queries.description: Unused variables complicate the program and can indicate a possible mistake on the part of the programmer.
queries.name: A project shall not contain unused global and namespace variables

queries.description: Unused variables complicate the program and can indicate a possible mistake on the part of the programmer.
queries.name: A project shall not contain unused member variables

M0-1-3.title: A project shall not contain unused variables.

queries.description: Single use local POD variables complicate the program and can indicate a possible mistake on the part of the programmer.
queries.name: A project shall not contain non-volatile local POD variables having only one use

queries.description: Single use global or namespace POD variables complicate the program and can indicate a possible mistake on the part of the programmer.
queries.name: A project shall not contain non-volatile global or namespace POD variables having only one use

queries.description: Single use member POD variables complicate the program and can indicate a possible mistake on the part of the programmer.
queries.name: A project shall not contain non-volatile member POD variables having only one use

M0-1-4.title: A project shall not contain non-volatile POD variables having only one use.

queries.description: Dead code complicates the program and can indicate a possible mistake on the part of the programmer.
queries.name: There shall be no dead code

M0-1-9.title: There shall be no dead code.
